job_tasks.phrase: Make your mark as a .NET software engineer with a focus on AI
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates a role focused on software engineering, specifically within the .NET ecosystem.

job_tasks.phrase: building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core activity of creating and improving software that incorporates AI.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the task of incorporating pre-existing or developed AI models into software, a key aspect of modeling integration.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications and Microsoft environment
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the software engineering concerns of scalability, efficiency, and integration into existing systems.

job_tasks.phrase: responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the maintenance and updating of existing software, a standard software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states core software development activities focused on AI-enhanced applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications
job_tasks.justification: This points to the collaborative aspect of integrating AI models, which is part of the modeling lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices
job_tasks.justification: These are fundamental software development and quality assurance concerns.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing
job_tasks.justification: These are standard software development practices for ensuring code quality and functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks
job_tasks.justification: This clearly indicates the need to continuously learn and adapt to new technologies.

soft_skills.phrase: You will work closely with other software engineers and AI specialists
Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on .NET software development and integration of AI models into existing applications. While AI is mentioned, there's no emphasis on building, fine-tuning, or designing generative models themselves, which is characteristic of a GenAI Engineer. The core responsibilities lean towards traditional software engineering with AI integration rather than specialized GenAI development.
